Package engine

Class Board

java.lang.Object
engine.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents a chess board and it's functionality.
Author:
Shakir

  • Field Details

    • board

      public int[] board
      A 0x88 integer array representing pieces on a chess board.

    • colour

      public boolean colour
      The colour of the current player. true : white false : black

    • turn

      The turn of the current player. true : white false : black

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      The constructor for class Board. Initialises the board to the chess starting position and sets the current player colour to white.

    • Board

      public Board​(String fen)
      Another constructor for class Board. Initialises the board to the positions represented by then FEN string. Sets the castling rights to false as they will get changed to true if the FEN String indicates it.
      Parameters:
      fen - forsyth-edwards notation string

    • Board

      public Board​(Board board)
      Another constructor for class Board. This constructor is used to perform a deep copy of a board class. The array and other variables are copied from the previous object.
      Parameters:
      board - a Board object

  • Method Details

    • getBoard

      public int[] getBoard()
      Returns a deep copy of the object's board array.
      Returns:
      board array copy

    • getKnightMoves

      public ArrayList<Integer> getKnightMoves​(int position)
      Returns an array of the positions a knight can move to given the position of the knight on the board. The knight moves are calculated using an offset. Potential captures and blocked positions are taken into consideration.
      Parameters:
      position - an integer representing the position of the knight on the board
      Returns:
      array of positions knight can move to
